Quart Uploads#

Quart-Uploads allows your application to flexibly and efficiently handle file uploading and serving the uploaded files.

You can create different sets of uploads - one for document attachments, one for photos, etc. - and the application can be configured to save them all in different places and to generate different URLs for them.

Quart-Uploads is developed on github, here .

For more information on Quart, visit here .

Quart-Uploads is based on Flask-Uploads by maxcountryman.
